body.name: CHARTOU Women's Summer Drawstring Waist Wide Leg Loose Cotton Linen Palazzo Pants
features: Material: cotton and flax, super soft fabric, skin-friendly and comfortable to wear
Color: 4 colors in stock, Navy, Black, Grey and Light Blue; actual color may slightly vary from what it appears due to different monitor settings
Features: pull on closure, expandable waistband, 2 hand pockets, solid color, loose fit style, lightweight and breathable
Occasion: suitable for casual wear, street, school running, yoga, beach or holiday etc
Tips: Machin wash, do not dry clean; XS(0-2) S(4-6) M(8-10) L(12-14) XL(16-18) 2XL(20-22)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #6,920 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #54 in Women's Pants

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Summer Lightweight Straight-leg Linen Cotton Casual Beach Pant For Women

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased 3 pair; ordered my normal size and the fit is great. These are so lightweight and comfortable. During hot, humid summer days these felt cooler than shorts.These pants have a drawstring that is sewn into the pant seam, which means it will not come out by accident or by choice. If I could I would remove the drawstring but I understand why it is secured. The waist also has a wide elastic, which I find to be a little too wide. At some point I may open up the seams to remove the drawstring and replace with a slightly thinner elastic.I machine wash on the delicate cycle with cold water, hang dry, and iron on highest setting with steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gray and green are great, avoid black
reviews.reviewText: I wear an XXL in this style. I am 5"4" and weigh 195 pounds. I am pear-shaped so I carry more weight in my bottom than top.I ordered six althogether: 2 gray, 1 green, and 3 black. I am a high school teacher, and my thermostat is set for the comfort of the students but it's too hot for me because I'm always on the move. I need long pants that are closer to summer or fall weight. I feel lucky that I found these.That being said, the sizing and feel are not consistent across the colors. The gray and green drape beautifully and are consistently comfortable. They feel like a great blend of cotton and linen.The black pants are a heavier, thicker material, and the waistband is larger. It sits below my belly button instead of above. The crotch depth is too low, part way down my thighs. Anything in my pockets pulls the waistband down to the point that it's in danger of dropping beneath my shirt hem. They are physically and psychologically uncomfortable; constantly worrying if my pants will droop makes me very self-consious. NOT a good idea when I'm around teenage boys all day!I returned the black. I don't want them in a smaller size, I like the drape of the other colors better. I returned the black pairs and will buy more gray and green.If it weren't for the problem with the black pants, I would give these 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are transparent, and are long enough for me (5’10”)…I’m wearing them to Mexico and Morocco soon (and Morocco for cultural modesty reasons), and they’ll be great…I have not washed them yet, I plan to hand wash in cold and line dry…hoping they won’t shrink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Black pants do not feel like linen and is a heavy coarse cotton type fabric,
reviews.reviewText: I read many of the reviews before purchasing these black size L pants. I followed one persons advice as to removing the too stiff and too tight elastic (yet to do with 2 rows of stitching sewing the elastic onto the waist band, more on that later.) The pants are not as pictured and are far from light weight and linen. In fact, they feel like a loose woven coarse cotton fabric which I had hoped would lose some of that effect after washing in cold water and drying on warm. In fact, they remained coarse. I dried them to shrink them up a bit for fit. They did shrink quite a bit in length which is fine as I wear flat shoes. Since I washed them I naturally will keep them. I am hoping that by removing the elastic they will at least end up with a more casual look and not look like inexpensive scrubs. Too much work for a pair of pants that cost $26. I would not recommend these pants as they are nothing like what is pictured or described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best summer pants
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough good things about these pants! I bought them in 4 colors; white, black, green, and tan. They are pictured the same as they came. I’m about 215lbs, 5’7 and I bought them all in XL and they fit perfectly. Length is perfect right above the ground, the waste is stretchy enough and you can tighten with the strings, high wasted above the belly button. I bought these in hopes to conceal my belly/lower belly because it’s always been a problem area for me especially in jeans. These are the perfect pant for summer to be light enough, comfortable, and hide those insecurities and still look put together. Love pairing them with a crop top and sandals. They aren’t as flowy and wide as other linen pants I’ve had in the past which I love, they are a bit more fitting all the way down but still have a looser fit and the opening at the feet aren’t swallowing my feet to where you can’t see them. I haven’t washed them yet so not sure if they’ll shrink like the other reviews say. I hope not because I’ll want to live in these all summer! (I tried this years target ones that look exactly the same in an xl and they were just way too wide, baggy, and long for me, get these for a more “fitting” but comfy look)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not long enough! Wrong color
reviews.reviewText: I was super excited to get these after reading the reviews but they did not meet my expectations. I’m 5’9” and they were NOT long enough. Also the color was much darker than the photo. The quality was decent but the drawstrings were different. If they were long enough I would keep. Tall girls don’t be fooled by reviews, save your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these pants so much! They are super breathable and comfy.

Siempre me ha gustado los pantalones sueltos y este me ha quedado de lujo. Su tela muy fresca y su caída espectacular. Para una tarde casual o un día de playa. Voy por el tercero hasta terminar con la gama de colores. Recomendado
I like the material quality, and the way it fits.

I am really pleased with the sturdy feel of this casual linen pant. I won’t be ironing them, but I could if the event calls for it! I love how keep it simple, light and breezy they feel with white, blue and dark blue tops and accessories! Another win Amazon!! Thanks!
sitzt sehr schön und passt zu jedem oberteil

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazon promotes outstanding service and quality products
reviews.reviewText: Amazon provides an extremely efficient service. The pants arrived early, fit perfectly and feel great.
